CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE MANAGEMENT IS COMPLICATED. SANDSIV VOC HUB MEAKES IT EASY AND INTUITIVE.

YOU SEE NUMBERS, LET’S GET YOU TO SEE INSIGHTS AND TURN THEM INTO ACTIONS

  • C-Level:can easily review KPIs such, for instance Net promoter Score, understanding how their companies are performing accordingly to the Voice of the Customers.
  • CX Experts:can easily manage the workflows behind a full VOC program: manage surveys, include external information (e.g. Facebook or Twitter), perform text mining and sentiment analysis, visualize data on customer dashboards, and much more.
  • Data Scientist:thanks to the full integration of KNIME server we can offer state of the arts predictive analytics capabilities to all data scientists. SandSiv is the unique solution that makes business people and data scientists happy!

VOC HUB™

Complete Voice of the Customer Solution

Analyse customers’ cumulative experience across multiple touch points, multiple channels, and over time – manage the cross-functional, end-to-end experience that shapes the customer’s view of your business.
